description: Triangular array E by rows: E(n,k) = number of partitions of n into an even number of parts, the greatest being k.
comments: The reversed rows (see example) stabilize to A027193. [_Joerg Arndt_, May 12 2013]
formula: G.f. (including term a(0)=1): sum(n>=0, q^(2*n)/prod(k=1..2*n, 1-z*q^k) ), set z=1 to obtain g.f. for A027187. [_Joerg Arndt_, May 12 2013]
prog: (PARI)N = 20;  q = 'q + O('q^N);gf = sum(n=0,N, q^(2*n)/prod(k=1, 2*n, 1-'z*q^k) );v = Vec(gf);{ for(n=2, #v, /* print triangle starting with row 1: */    p = Pol('c0 +'cn*'z^n + v[n],'z);    p = polrecip(p);    p = Vec(p);    p[1] -= 'c0;    p = vector(#p-2, j, p[j]);    print(p);); }/* _Joerg Arndt_, May 12 2013 */
crossrefs: E(n, k) = O(n-k, 1)+O(n-k, 2)+...+O(n-k, m), where m=MIN{k, n-k}, n >= 2, O given by A026920.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
